org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler

Class HBaseVertexHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseElementHandler
      • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseGraphElementHandler
        • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseVertexHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ElementHandler, GraphElementHandler, VertexHandler

    public class HBaseVertexHandler
extends HBaseGraphElementHandler
implements VertexHandler
    Used to read/write EPGM vertex data from/to a HBase table.

    Vertex data in HBase:

    |---------|--------------------|---------| | row-key | meta | data | |---------|----------|---------|---------| | "0" | label | graphs | k1 | k2 | | |----------|---------|----|----| | | "Person" | [0,2] | v1 | v2 | |---------|----------|---------|----|----|

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
